site.name: UFOBeep
site.description: Community-driven platform for reporting and tracking unexplained aerial phenomena (UAP) with scientific precision.
site.keywords: UFO, UAP, sightings, unexplained aerial phenomena, community reporting, scientific observation
site.author: UFOBeep Team

home.title: UFOBeep - Report and Track UAP Sightings
home.description: Join thousands of observers worldwide in documenting unexplained aerial phenomena with scientific precision. Download our app to start reporting sightings in your area.
home.keywords: UFO sightings, UAP reports, unexplained phenomena, sky watching, community observation

app.title: Download UFOBeep App - Mobile UAP Reporting
app.description: Get the UFOBeep mobile app to report UFO sightings with GPS precision, photo capture, and real-time community discussions. Available for iOS and Android.
app.keywords: UFOBeep app, mobile UFO reporting, GPS sightings, UAP mobile app, sky observation app

alerts.title: Recent UFO Sightings and UAP Reports
alerts.description: Browse the latest unexplained aerial phenomena reports from observers worldwide. Filter by location, date, and sighting type.
alerts.keywords: UFO alerts, recent sightings, UAP reports, aerial phenomena, sighting database

alertDetail.title: UFO Sighting Report #{id}
alertDetail.description: Detailed report of unexplained aerial phenomena including witness accounts, location data, and community discussion.
alertDetail.keywords: UFO report, UAP sighting details, witness account, aerial phenomena evidence

privacy.title: Privacy Policy - UFOBeep
privacy.description: Learn how UFOBeep protects your privacy while collecting and processing UAP sighting data for scientific research.
privacy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, UFOBeep privacy, personal information, data security

terms.title: Terms of Service - UFOBeep
terms.description: Terms and conditions for using the UFOBeep platform to report and discuss unexplained aerial phenomena sightings.
terms.keywords: terms of service, user agreement, UFOBeep terms, platform rules, service conditions

safety.title: Safety Guidelines for UAP Observers
safety.description: Essential safety information and best practices for observing and reporting unexplained aerial phenomena responsibly.
safety.keywords: UAP safety, observation guidelines, responsible reporting, sky watching safety, observer protection

home.alt: UFOBeep - Report and Track UAP Sightings
